title: Role-Play Exercise
introText: With a trusted friend or therapist, rehearse using STOP in hypothetical scenarios like receiving critical feedback, dealing with frustration, or facing an unexpected challenge. Practice makes the skill more natural when you need it most.
scenarioIdeas: Receiving unexpected critical feedback at work or school
Someone canceling plans at the last minute
Dealing with a technology failure or unexpected problem
Responding to a triggering comment on social media

inputs.title: Role-Play Partner
inputs.placeholder: e.g., Friend, therapist, family member, support group member...

inputs.title: Scenario Context
inputs.placeholder: Describe the hypothetical scenario you're role-playing... What's the situation? What triggers might come up?

inputs.title: Learnings & Reflections
inputs.prompt: What did you learn from this role-play?
inputs.placeholder: Reflect on the experience... What worked well? What was challenging? How did using STOP feel? What would you do differently in a real situation?
